ing: 1 (270 g) tub PHILADELPHIA Savoury Garlic Cooking Creme
1/2 cup Oscar Mayer Real Bacon Recipe Pieces
1/2 cup shredded Cracker Barrel Old Cheddar Cheese
des: "Broccoli florets, bacon pieces, shredded cheese, chopped onions, and sunflower seeds are tossed together in a creamy garlic sauce."
ins:
Mix first 2 ingredients in large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients; toss to coat.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
